This isn’t a proper tutorial. You’re just telling someone to call a method.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue on login
item.dc:creator: @dragon_boy dragon boy
item.description:
@dragon_boy wrote:

Difficulty 1/10
Base; Delta cleaned
Knowledge needed; C&p
How hard is it; Easy

I know this is easy but i had to Do the tut for a Different site so i thought id post here.
Dont flame me. , If you want this removed just tell me i will i dont want to course no hate

[size=8pt]This is for my Delta cleaned souce. [/size]

[size=10pt]This will all be done in client.java[/size]

Find you’r Login message . In my case it’ll be

sM("Welcome to RuneWorld");

Above that Add this

talk1("#TEXT#"0);

Soo compile And test . you should have 1 line of text in a dialogue when you log in.

I will show you how to add more lines of text

2 lines of text

talk2("Welcome to RuneWorld","Follow the rules and read the help guide",0);

3 lines of text

talk3("Welcome to RuneWorld","Follow the rules and read the help guide","LALALALALALA",0);

4 lines of text

talk4("Welcome to RuneWorld","Follow the rules and read the help guide","LALALALALALA","LALALALALALALA",0);

[size=10pt]For the 3 and 4 lined text to work you may need theese method’s Other wise you will get errors[/size]

public void talk3(String text, String text2, String text3, int npc) { sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126(text, 4904); sendFrame126(text2, 4905); sendFrame126(text3, 4906); sendFrame75(npc, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); } public void talk4(String text, String text2, String text3, String text4, int npc) { sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4902); sendFrame126(text, 4903); sendFrame126(text2, 4904); sendFrame126(text3, 4905); sendFrame126(text4, 4906); sendFrame75(npc, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); }

Of course you can figure where the text goes.
The " 0 " at the very end of each code is the npc ID you want it to show. In my case Mines “Hans”

Pictures…

The Dialogue In motion.

1.png771×511

Read full topic
